sentences.en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentences.en: All great songs are informed by a certain sadness and tension.
sentences.cn: 所有很棒的歌曲都透着某种悲伤和张力。

sentences.en: All mothers share to some extent in the tension of a wedding.
sentences.cn: 从某种程度上说，所有的母亲在婚礼上多少都有点紧张。

sentences.en: For several hours, tension mounted.
sentences.cn: 有几个小时，紧张局势有所加剧。

sentences.en: He became more aware of the things that started that tension off.
sentences.cn: 他越来越清楚地认识到引起紧张局势的原因。

sentences.en: Humour is wonderful for releasing tension.
sentences.cn: 幽默是舒缓紧张情绪的良方。

sentences.en: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.cn: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.en: She could have screamed with tension.
sentences.cn: 她紧张得差点叫起来。

sentences.en: Some of the tension Altman builds up starts to sag.
sentences.cn: 奥尔特曼制造的一些紧张氛围开始缓解。

sentences.en: Tension in the home increases if you bottle things up.
sentences.cn: 你如果把事情强压在心里，家里的气氛就会更趋紧张。

sentences.en: Tension in the neck muscles can cause headaches.
sentences.cn: 颈部肌肉紧张会导致头痛。

sentences.en: The film explored the tension between public duty and personal affections.
sentences.cn: 这部电影探讨了公共义务和个人情感之间的冲突。

sentences.en: The Mud Bath is particularly recommended for relieving tension and stiff muscles.
sentences.cn: 特别推荐想要放松情绪、缓解肌肉酸痛的人泡泥浆浴。

sentences.en: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.cn: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.en: The tension was mounting perceptibly.
sentences.cn: 紧张状况明显在加剧。

sentences.en: There is tension in the region following the killing of seven civilians.
sentences.cn: 随着7名平民被杀害，该地区局势紧张起来。

sentences.en: There was a knot of tension in his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他紧张得心揪得紧紧的。

sentences.en: There was a lot of tension on the wire before it snapped.
sentences.cn: 金属丝承受着很大的拉力，最后绷断了。

sentences.en: There's still an atmosphere of great hostility and tension in the city.
sentences.cn: 强烈的敌对和紧张气氛依然笼罩着这座城市。

sentences.en: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.cn: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

words.tran_cn: [力] 拉力的；可伸长的；可拉长的
张力计；表面张力计；土壤湿度计
拉紧；变为紧张（tense的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 缓和紧张状况；缓和紧张局势
低压的；低电压；带低压的
张紧装置；拉紧装置；张力装置
拉力计，张力计；牵引测力计
单轴拉伸；单向拉伸；单轴向张力

trans.tran_cn: 紧张关系/气氛，矛盾，焦虑，冲突，拉力
trans.tran_en: tightness or stiffness in a wire, rope, muscle etc
